Name: C2_Workplace closing
Coding:
0 - no measures
1 - recommend closing (or recommend work from home)
2 - require closing (or work from home) for some sectors or categorries of workers
3 - require closing (or worrk from home) for all-but-essential workplaces (eg grocery stores, doctors)
Blank - no data

Name: C6_Stay at home requirements
Description: Record orders to "shelter-in-place" and otherwise confine to the home
Coding:
0 - no measures
1 - recommend not leaving house
2 - rerquire not leaving house with exceptions for daily exercise, grocery shopping, and 'essential' trips
3 - require not leaving house with minimal exceptions (eg allowed to leave house once a week, or only one person can leave at a time, etc)
Blank - no data
